title: Wtb/wttf: T222 Fatima card of Nemo Leibold
author: ValKehl

posts.post_title: Wtb/wttf: T222 Fatima card of Nemo Leibold
posts.post_content: I'm looking for a collector-grade T222 Fatima card of Nemo Leibold - raw or slabbed. Yes, I've seen the overpriced example that's been on eBay for a looong time. I prefer an email to a PM - [url]ekehl333@aol.com[/url]
